origin.extraorigins.floran.name: Floran
origin.extraorigins.floran.description: 本質上是植物人，可以從陽光中吸收營養，在水裡吸取力量
origin.extraorigins.inchling.name: Inchling
origin.extraorigins.inchling.description: 人類的小型亞種，善於利用其體型躲藏敵人，還能鑽進狹小的地方。
origin.extraorigins.piglin.name: 豬布林
origin.extraorigins.piglin.description: 地獄原住民，豬布林相當熱愛黃金，使用黃金的技藝亦是爐火純青。
power.extraorigins.green_thumb.name: 綠拇指
power.extraorigins.green_thumb.descripti: 你可以耗費食物來種植植物。
power.extraorigins.photosynthesis.name: 光合作用
power.extraorigins.photosynthesis.descri: 你非常享受陽光的洗禮
power.extraorigins.absorbing.name: 吸水
power.extraorigins.absorbing.description: 你會在身體濕透時承受多兩點的傷害
power.extraorigins.flammable.name: 易燃
power.extraorigins.flammable.description: 火焰會對你造成兩倍傷害
power.extraorigins.delicate.name: 精緻細嫩
power.extraorigins.delicate.description: 太冷和太熱的生態域會令你緩速
power.extraorigins.nectarivore.name: 花蜜
power.extraorigins.bite_sized.name: Bite Sized
power.extraorigins.bite_sized.descriptio: You are 4 times smaller than a regular person. You have 5 less hearts and 0.5 more attack speed.
power.extraorigins.small_appetite.name: 食慾不大
power.extraorigins.nimble.name: 靈活移動
power.extraorigins.nimble.description: 你免疫荊棘和投擲物的傷害。
power.extraorigins.all_that_glitters.des: Golden tools deal extra damage and golden armor has additional protection. Golden equipment lasts much longer， but non golden equipment breaks faster.
power.extraorigins.piglin_neutrality.des: Piglins do not attack you unless provoked. Brutes will still attack on sight.
power.extraorigins.crossbow_master.name: 弩箭大師
power.extraorigins.crossbow_master.descr: 使用弩攻擊時傷害提升75%
power.extraorigins.homesick.name: 思鄉症
power.extraorigins.homesick.description: 當你不在地獄時，你會變成不死族的殭屍並免疫火焰傷害，但會走得較慢。
power.extraorigins.flabby.name: Flabby
power.extraorigins.flabby.description: 比起一般人，你的血量少了兩顆心。
power.extraorigins.soul_spooked.name: Soul Spooked
power.extraorigins.soul_spooked.descript: You are afraid of Soul Fire, becoming weak when near it.
